scripts.pre-commit: concurrently   --kill-others-on-fail   -p "[{name}]" -n "Utils,Backend,Frontend,Common" -c "yellow.bold,cyan.bold,green.bold,magenta.bold" "yarn --cwd utils run pre-commit" "yarn --cwd backend run pre-commit"  "yarn --cwd frontend run pre-commit" "yarn --cwd common run pre-commit"
scripts.test: concurrently  -p "[{name}]" -n "Utils,Backend,Frontend,Common" -c "yellow.bold,cyan.bold,green.bold,magenta.bold" "yarn --cwd utils  run test" "yarn --cwd backend run server-test"  "yarn --cwd frontend  run ui-test" "yarn --cwd common run common-test"
scripts.yarn-update: concurrently  -p "[{name}]" -n "Utils,Backend,Frontend,Common" -c "yellow.bold,cyan.bold,green.bold,magenta.bold" "yarn --cwd utils  update" "yarn --cwd backend update"  "yarn --cwd frontend  update"
scripts.yarn-install: concurrently  -p "[{name}]" -n "Utils,Backend,Frontend,Common" -c "yellow.bold,cyan.bold,green.bold,magenta.bold" "yarn --cwd utils  install" "yarn --cwd backend  install"  "yarn --cwd frontend  install"
scripts.yarn-install-force: concurrently  -p "[{name}]" -n "Utils,Backend,Frontend,Common" -c "yellow.bold,cyan.bold,green.bold,magenta.bold" "yarn --cwd utils  install --force  --cache-folder .yarncache/utils" "yarn --cwd backend  install --force  --cache-folder .yarncache/backend"  "yarn --cwd frontend  install --force  --cache-folder .yarncache/ui"
scripts.yarn-build: concurrently  -p "[{name}]" -n "Utils,Backend,Frontend,Common" -c "yellow.bold,cyan.bold,green.bold,magenta.bold" "yarn --cwd utils  run test" "yarn --cwd backend run serverbuild"  "yarn --cwd frontend  ui-build"
